yogas.name: Gaja Kesari Yoga

formation.rule: Jupiter is in a Kendra (1st, 4th, 7th, 10th house) from the Moon

effects.general: This yoga brings wealth, intelligence, fame, and virtuous conduct. The native gains respect in society and achieves success in endeavors.

classicalReferences.translation: When Jupiter is in a quadrant from the Moon, the person will be renowned, intelligent, and respected by rulers.

yogas.modernInterpretation: Success in education, law, teaching, or advisory roles. Strong analytical and communication abilities.

yogas.name: Neecha Bhanga Raja Yoga

formation.rule: A debilitated planet is cancelled by: (1) Its dispositor in a Kendra, (2) Its exaltation lord in a Kendra, (3) Aspect from its exaltation lord, or (4) Exchange with its debilitation lord

effects.general: Despite initial struggles or humble beginnings, the native rises to prominence. This yoga indicates transformation from weakness to strength, often through perseverance.

primary.details: Strengthen both the debilitated planet and its dispositor through mantras and gemstones

classicalReferences.translation: When debilitation is cancelled, the native achieves greatness after initial difficulties.

yogas.modernInterpretation: In contemporary times, this yoga manifests as "rags to riches" stories, startup founders who overcome failures, or individuals who transform disadvantages into strengths.

yogas.name: Budhaditya Yoga

formation.rule: Mercury and Sun conjunct in the same house (not within 14 degrees for best results)
cancellationFactors: Mercury or Sun in enemy sign
strengtheningFactors: Both in own signs or exalted

effects.general: Bestows intelligence, wit, communication skills, and success in intellectual pursuits. The native is skilled in speech and writing.

yogas.modernInterpretation: Excellent for media, writing, teaching, technology, and business. Strong analytical abilities.

classicalReferences.translation: One with Sun-Mercury combination will be skilled in fine arts, astrology, and will have sweet speech.

yogas.name: Hamsa Yoga (Pancha Mahapurusha)

formation.rule: Jupiter in own sign (Sagittarius/Pisces) or exalted (Cancer) in a Kendra

effects.general: Bestows spiritual wisdom, righteousness, wealth, and charitable nature. The native becomes a respected leader and counselor.

mantras: Om Gram Greem Graum Sah Gurave Namaha

classicalReferences.translation: One born in Hamsa Yoga will be righteous, will have marks of conch and lotus, will be charitable and have sweet voice.

yogas.modernInterpretation: Excellent for religious leaders, philosophers, professors, and ethical business leaders.

yogas.name: Malavya Yoga (Pancha Mahapurusha)

formation.rule: Venus in own sign (Taurus/Libra) or exalted (Pisces) in a Kendra

effects.general: Brings beauty, luxury, artistic talents, and material comforts. The native enjoys pleasures and has a charismatic personality.

classicalReferences.translation: One with Malavya Yoga will have beautiful spouse, vehicles, wealth, and enjoyment of all pleasures.

yogas.modernInterpretation: Ideal for artists, designers, entertainers, luxury brand executives, and diplomats.

yogas.name: Ruchaka Yoga (Pancha Mahapurusha)

formation.rule: Mars in own sign (Aries/Scorpio) or exalted (Capricorn) in a Kendra

effects.general: Grants courage, leadership, military prowess, and victory over enemies. The native is strong-willed and determined.

mantras: Om Kram Kreem Kraum Sah Bhaumaya Namaha

classicalReferences.translation: One with Ruchaka Yoga will be leader of armies, cruel, wealthy, and have marks of chakra on feet.

yogas.modernInterpretation: Excellent for military officers, athletes, surgeons, and executives in competitive fields.

yogas.name: Bhadra Yoga (Pancha Mahapurusha)

formation.rule: Mercury in own sign (Gemini/Virgo) or exalted (Virgo) in a Kendra

effects.general: Gives high intelligence, eloquence, longevity, and success in business. The native is witty and helpful to relatives.

mantras: Om Bram Breem Braum Sah Budhaya Namaha

classicalReferences.translation: One with Bhadra Yoga will be long-lived, intelligent, helpful to relatives, and will have marks of conch and fish.

yogas.modernInterpretation: Perfect for entrepreneurs, writers, tech professionals, and media personalities.

yogas.name: Shasha Yoga (Pancha Mahapurusha)

formation.rule: Saturn in own sign (Capricorn/Aquarius) or exalted (Libra) in a Kendra

effects.general: Grants longevity, discipline, administrative abilities, and control over resources. Success comes through perseverance.

mantras: Om Pram Preem Praum Sah Shanaischaraya Namaha

classicalReferences.translation: One with Shasha Yoga will command servants, forests, forts, and will have marks of mace and elephant goad.

yogas.modernInterpretation: Ideal for senior executives, judges, administrators, miners, and real estate developers.

yogas.name: Adhi Yoga

formation.rule: Benefics (Mercury, Venus, Jupiter) in 6th, 7th, or 8th houses from Moon

effects.general: Brings wealth, ministerial position, longevity, and freedom from diseases. The native gains through authority and wisdom.

mantras: Chant mantras of benefic planets present

classicalReferences.translation: If benefics occupy 6th-8th from Moon, the person will be polite, trustworthy, will have royal honor, and comforts.

yogas.modernInterpretation: Success in government service, ministry, advisory roles, and positions of authority.

yogas.name: Lakshmi Yoga

formation.rule: Lord of 9th house is strong and placed in own sign or exalted in a Kendra or Trikona

effects.general: Bestows immense wealth, luxury, beauty, and gains from fortune. The native is blessed by Lakshmi (goddess of wealth).

classicalReferences.translation: When 9th lord is powerful in Kendra or Trina, the native enjoys wealth like that of Kubera (god of wealth).

yogas.modernInterpretation: Ideal for business owners, investors, luxury industry professionals, and inheritors of wealth.

yogas.name: Saraswati Yoga

formation.rule: Jupiter, Venus, Mercury in Kendras/Trikonas/2nd house from each other, Jupiter strong

effects.general: Grants mastery over arts, sciences, and literature. The native is learned, eloquent, and famous for intellectual achievements.

primary.details: Worship Goddess Saraswati on Vasant Panchami

classicalReferences.translation: One with Saraswati Yoga will be poet, skilled in all arts, famous, and devotee of gods.

yogas.modernInterpretation: Perfect for scholars, authors, musicians, scientists, and spiritual teachers.

yogas.name: Chandra-Mangala Yoga

formation.rule: Moon and Mars conjunct or mutual aspect

effects.general: Grants wealth through earnings, business acumen, and restless energy. May indicate earnings through women or liquid products.

classicalReferences.translation: One who deals in drinks, earthern jars, women and is wealthy.

yogas.modernInterpretation: Success in chemical engineering, beverage industry, nursing, or finance.

yogas.name: Dhana Yoga (2nd Lord in 11th)

formation.rule: Lord of 2nd house placed in 11th house

effects.general: Significant accumulation of wealth. Earnings come from multiple sources and investments grow rapidly.

classicalReferences.translation: The native will be famous and wealthy through his own efforts.

yogas.modernInterpretation: Excellent for investors, bankers, and entrepreneurs.

yogas.name: Dhana Yoga (5th Lord in 9th)

formation.rule: Lord of 5th house placed in 9th house

effects.general: Wealth through speculation, creativity, children, or publications. Indicates strong past-life merit.

classicalReferences.translation: The person will be a king or equal to a king, very wealthy and fortunate.

yogas.modernInterpretation: Authors, stock traders, and creative directors.

yogas.name: Dhana Yoga (9th Lord in 2nd)

formation.rule: Lord of 9th house placed in 2nd house

effects.general: Wealth through inheritance, family business, or higher knowledge. Lucky with money management.

classicalReferences.translation: Native will be wealthy, learned and happy.

yogas.modernInterpretation: Family business successors, professors, financial advisors.

yogas.name: Dhana Yoga (11th Lord in 2nd)

formation.rule: Lord of 11th house placed in 2nd house

effects.general: High liquidity and cash flow. The native creates large financial networks.

classicalReferences.translation: Native will be endowed with wealth, grains and family happiness.

yogas.modernInterpretation: Large scale traders, network marketers, CFOs.

yogas.name: Dhana Yoga (Lagnesha-Dhana Parivartana)

formation.rule: Exchange of signs between 1st Lord and 2nd Lord

effects.general: Self-made wealth. The person accumulates riches through personal effort and personality.

classicalReferences.translation: One gains wealth through his own valour and efforts.

yogas.modernInterpretation: Self-made billionaires, celebrities, personal brands.

yogas.name: Harsha Yoga (Viparita)

formation.rule: 6th Lord placed in 6th, 8th, or 12th house
strengtheningFactors: No aspect from benefics (pure maleficence reinforces defense)

effects.general: Protection from enemies, strong constitution, and success through overcoming obstacles.

classicalReferences.translation: One is happy, invincible, physically strong, and wealthy.

yogas.modernInterpretation: Success in litigation, competitive sports, or defense.

yogas.name: Sarala Yoga (Viparita)

formation.rule: 8th Lord placed in 6th, 8th, or 12th house

effects.general: Longevity, fearlessness, and sudden gains. Ability to survive crises and prosper.

classicalReferences.translation: Long lived, fearless, learned, a terror to enemies and wealthy.

yogas.modernInterpretation: Risk management, insurance, research, mining.

yogas.name: Vimala Yoga (Viparita)

formation.rule: 12th Lord placed in 6th, 8th, or 12th house

effects.general: Frugal, independent, happy, and spiritually inclined. Accumulates wealth through saving.

classicalReferences.translation: Frugal, happy, independent and possessed of good qualities.

yogas.modernInterpretation: Foreign services, auditors, spiritual healers.

yogas.name: Kemudruma Yoga

formation.rule: No planets (except Sun/Rahu/Ketu) in 2nd or 12th from Moon
cancellationFactors: Planets in Kendra from Moon or Lagna (Kemudruma Bhanga)

effects.general: Can cause mental loneliness, poverty, and struggle. However, often found in charts of great leaders who feel isolated.

classicalReferences.translation: The person will be dirty, sorrowful, doing unrighteous deeds, and poor.

yogas.modernInterpretation: Depression, isolation, but potential for great spiritual depth if cancelled.

yogas.name: Shakata Yoga

formation.rule: Moon in 6th, 8th, or 12th from Jupiter

effects.general: Fluctuating fortune. Life moves like a wheelâ€”sometimes high, sometimes low.

classicalReferences.translation: Native loses wealth and regains it, undergoing much mental anguish.

yogas.modernInterpretation: Freelancers, seasonal business owners, cyclical financial status.

yogas.name: Daridra Yoga

formation.rule: Lord of 11th house in 6th, 8th, or 12th house

effects.general: Difficulty in retaining gains, debts, or limited income sources.

classicalReferences.translation: The native will be in debts, cruel, poor and mean.

yogas.modernInterpretation: Financial instability, bad investments.

yogas.name: Mahabhagya Yoga

formation.rule: Males: Day birth, Sun, Moon, Lagna in odd signs. Females: Night birth, Sun, Moon, Lagna in even signs.

effects.general: Great fortune, popularity, and leadership. The native is blessed by destiny.

classicalReferences.translation: Native causes immense pleasure to eyes of onlookers, is a lord of lands and generous.

yogas.modernInterpretation: Public figures, celebrities, charismatic leaders.

yogas.name: Amala Yoga

formation.rule: Benefic planet (Jupiter, Venus, Mercury) in 10th house from Moon or Lagna

effects.general: Professional success, stainless reputation, and humanitarian nature.

classicalReferences.translation: Person will be revered by the king, have a spotless character and be wealthy.

yogas.modernInterpretation: NGO leaders, judges, reputable professionals.

yogas.name: Parvata Yoga

formation.rule: Benefics in Kendras, and 6th/8th houses either empty or occupied by benefics

effects.general: Lasting political power, wealth, and stability. Like a mountain (Parvata).

classicalReferences.translation: Native will possess everlasting wealth and happiness and will be a lord of the earth.

yogas.modernInterpretation: Land owners, political positions, stable administrative roles.

yogas.name: Kahala Yoga

formation.rule: Lords of 4th and 9th in mutual Kendras, and Lagna lord is strong

effects.general: Aggressive, daring, and commands a force/team. Success through execution.

classicalReferences.translation: Native will be daring, head of a small army and wealthy.

yogas.modernInterpretation: Police chiefs, military commanders, operations directors.

yogas.name: Sunapha Yoga

formation.rule: Planet (excluding Sun) in 2nd house from Moon

effects.general: Self-acquisition of wealth, intelligence, and good reputation.

classicalReferences.translation: Native will be a king, wealthy, intelligent and renowned.

yogas.modernInterpretation: Self-made professionals, steady income.

yogas.name: Anapha Yoga

formation.rule: Planet (excluding Sun) in 12th house from Moon

effects.general: Good manners, enjoyment of pleasures, and freedom from disease.

classicalReferences.translation: Native will be a king, free from disease, virtuous and happy.

yogas.modernInterpretation: Luxury lifestyle, diplomats, hospitality.

yogas.name: Durudhura Yoga

formation.rule: Planets (excluding Sun) in both 2nd and 12th from Moon

effects.general: Balance, wealth, vehicles, and comforts. Enjoyment of life.

classicalReferences.translation: Native will enjoy comforts of conveyances and servants.

yogas.modernInterpretation: Balanced life, transport business, logistics.

yogas.name: Vallaki (Vina) Yoga

formation.rule: All 7 planets distributed in exactly 7 signs
cancellationFactors: N/A (Nabhasa yogas usually have no cancellation)

effects.general: Love for music, arts, and refined skills. Varied interests.

classicalReferences.translation: Native will be fond of music, dance and will be learned.

yogas.modernInterpretation: Musicians, multi-talented artists.

yogas.name: Gada Yoga

formation.rule: All planets located in two adjacent Kendras (e.g., 1st and 4th)

effects.general: Wealthy, proud, performs sacrifices, and is skilled in weapons/tools.

classicalReferences.translation: Native will be wealthy, versed in Shastras and fearsome.

yogas.modernInterpretation: Security experts, manufacturing, technical trades.

doshas.name: Kala Sarpa Dosha

detection.rule: All 7 planets situated between Rahu and Ketu axis

doshas.classicalView: Struggle in early life, sudden rises and falls, feeling of restriction. Success often comes late (after 42).

primary.details: Kala Sarpa Shanti Puja at Trimbakeshwar
primary.description: Perform Kala Sarpa Shanti Puja at Trimbakeshwar to mitigate the effects of Kala Sarpa Dosha

secondary.description: Wear Gomed (Hessonite) - only after consultation for protection

doshas.name: Mangal Dosha (Kuja Dosha)

variations: Exceptions exist (e.g., Mars in Aries/Scorpio/Capricorn, or after age 28)

doshas.classicalView: Aggression in relationships, delay in marriage, or marital discord.

primary.description: Perform Mangal Nath Puja to mitigate the effects of Mangal Dosha (Kuja Dosha)
Perform Kumbh Vivah (symbolic marriage) to mitigate the effects of Mangal Dosha (Kuja Dosha)

doshas.name: Pitri Dosha

detection.rule: Sun or Moon afflicted by Rahu/Ketu, or 9th house heavily afflicted

doshas.classicalView: Ancestral debt causing lack of progress, progeny issues, or constant family disputes.

primary.description: Perform Pind Daan at Gaya to mitigate the effects of Pitri Dosha
Perform Shraddh ceremonies to mitigate the effects of Pitri Dosha

doshas.name: Shrapit Dosha

detection.rule: Conjunction of Saturn and Rahu in a single house
variations: Aspect relationship also considered by some

doshas.classicalView: Curse from past life. Brings chronic bad luck and negation of other good yogas in the chart.

primary.description: Perform Rudra Abhishek to mitigate the effects of Shrapit Dosha

doshas.name: Grahan Dosha

detection.rule: Sun or Moon conjunct Rahu or Ketu

doshas.classicalView: Mental cloudiness, lack of confidence (Sun), or emotional instability (Moon). parental health issues.

primary.description: Perform Surya/Chandra Shanti to mitigate the effects of Grahan Dosha

secondary.description: Chant Om Som Somaya Namaha (Moon) regularly

doshas.name: Guru Chandal Dosha

variations: Ketu connection forms Ganesha Yoga (different effect)

doshas.classicalView: Corruption of wisdom, disrespect towards teachers, atheism, or using knowledge for unethical gains.

primary.description: Perform Guru Puja to mitigate the effects of Guru Chandal Dosha

secondary.details: Om Gram Greem Graum Sah Gurave Namaha
secondary.description: Chant Om Gram Greem Graum Sah Gurave Namaha regularly

doshas.name: Angarak Dosha
doshas.classicalView: Extreme volatility, anger, accident proneness, and explosive energy.

primary.description: Perform Hanuman worship to mitigate the effects of Angarak Dosha

secondary.description: Chant Om Ham Hanumate Namaha regularly

doshas.name: Vish Dosha
doshas.classicalView: Depression, negativity, emotional heaviness, and feeling "poisoned" by life circumstances.

primary.description: Perform Shiva Abhishekam with milk to mitigate the effects of Vish Dosha

doshas.name: Nadi Dosha

detection.rule: Usually applied in matching (same Nadi), but in charts refers to physiological weakness based on Nakshatra element.

doshas.classicalView: Primarily affects progeny health and genetic compatibility in marriage. In individuals, indicates Ayurvedic constitution imbalance.

primary.description: Perform Nadi Dosha Nivaran Puja to mitigate the effects of Nadi Dosha

doshas.name: Putra Dosha

detection.rule: Affliction to 5th house/lord or Jupiter by malefics (Rahu/Ketu/Saturn)
variations: Specific curse of Brahmins or Serpents usually involved

doshas.classicalView: Delay or difficulty in having children, or worried about child welfare.

primary.description: Perform Santana Gopala Puja to mitigate the effects of Putra Dosha

secondary.description: Chant Om Namo Bhagavate Vasudevaya regularly
